title: Assistant Manager, Social Media (NYor SF) - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-02-2015 Brief Job Description: Looking for an Assistant Social Media Manager to help program our social media outlets (Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, etc.) with the coolest sports content on the planet. WeÂ’re not looking for boring brand promotion! Social media should be fun, engaging, and cool
